title: Curd Application
description: For the backend, I utilized Spring Tool Suite (Java) to build robust APIs, integrating an H2 database for seamless data management. On the frontend, I employed React to create an intuitive and responsive user interface.

title: Popular Anime
description: The site offers a curated collection of popular anime series and movies. Users can easily search and discover detailed information about their favorite shows. Watch trailers directly on the site.

title: My Portfolio
description: I have designed and developed my portfolio using React for the frontend, ensuring a dynamic and responsive user experience. The design was meticulously crafted using Figma, allowing for a seamless and visually appealing interface that reflects my skills and projects. The portfolio showcases my work, skills, and experiences, highlighting my expertise in web development and design.
